Nov. 25, 1951 D Yorkshire v Durham Contest (Section One)
Yorkshire v Durham Contest (Section One) 10 Test Piece Contest Yorkshire v. Durham Contest yorkshire-v-durham-contest-section-one
Coriolanus
Leeds Town Hall, Leeds, West Yorkshire, England, UK Class A points awarded Durham 840 Yorkshire 874
Class B Durham 832 Yorkshire 869
Total Durham 1672 Yorkshire 1743
An evening concert was given by Silksworth Colliery, Thornley Colliery, Rothwell Temperance & Hade Edge, Special conductors H.B Hawley & Roland Davies, with guest artiste Ken Smith.
